arts.ttl: Bruce Anderson’s brace earns Kilmarnock victory over St Mirren
arts.sum: The striker struck in each half – one a penalty rebound, the other direct from the spot.

arts.ttl: St Mirren make Owen Oseni their first foot as they signal January transfer intentions
arts.sum: The 21-year-old travelled north for his medical to put the finishing touches to a three-and-a-half year deal.

Both Kilmarnock and St Mirren are looking to put disappointing defeats that concluded 2024 behind them in their first Scottish Premiership fixture of 2025. Kilmarnock's rotten record at Easter Road c...
